title: Body-Solid 44LB 7FT Olympic Bar Rod with Heavy Duty Commercial Grade Construction for Weights Lifting Equipment, Strength Training and Fitness Workouts for Home Gym Dumbbell Barbell
features: Perfect For Heavy Workload - This 7ft 37lb barbell is perfect for all your Olympic lifting needs and the perfect addition to any training area. Precision-engineered from the highest quality components, this Olympic bar can support up to 600 pounds of plates, allowing you to handle incredibly heavy workloads. Our 7ft Olympic bar is perfect for various forms of powerlifting, weightlifting, bench press and cross training exercises.

37 Pound Weight - For a balanced workout, our barbell includes 37 pounds of weight. This allows you to select your own desired weight, whether it be lighter for more cardio and strength exercises, or heavier for more intense lifting. This set comes with an adjustable weight selector, enabling you to easily increase or decrease the desired weight.
BUILT TO LAST: Kitopa Olympic barbell 7 foot is built from solid cold rolled steel with a hard chrome finish, which is durable and for oxidation resistance.

Versatile - With its 7ft long design and 37lb weight, our barbell is great for a wide range of exercises, including bench press, shoulder press, bent-over rows, and more. The barbell itself is also highly durable, and is suitable for home or commercial use. From squats to bench presses, deadlifts, and more, this barbell is robust and durable for any type of exercise.

Easy to Use - This barbell is easy to set up and use, allowing you to start using it in no time. It's a great addition to any home gym, and is an essential piece of equipment for any serious lifter looking to increase their gains. Our Olympic barbell is made of high-quality steel and has a black powder coating for added durability and protection against rusting.
description: Experience the standard in powerlifting, and a favorite of bodybuilders everywhere with the Body-Solid Tools Olympic Straight Bar. A staple of championship lifts, the Body-Solid Tools Olympic Straight Barbell is designed to help take your free weight workouts to the next level. Pefect for both weight lifting and cross-training exercises. Precision-engineered from the highest-quality components, this Olympic barbell can support up to 600 pounds of weight plates, letting you take on incredibly heavy workloads.
